name: Dr.Pill esophagus adventure
description:
Help Dr.Pill clean out a patients esophagus! You as Dr.Pill's assistant must help Dr.Pill clean a patients esophagus of germs. Use the left and right keys to help Dr.Pill shoot mini anti-biotics and up keys to bring up Dr.Pill.

Music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6
